participant_1.background:
I'm not that concerned with looking my best.
i like to play outside.
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
I run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling.

participant_2.background:
I'm a kindergarten teacher who enjoys reading mysteries to unwind.
i prefer the night to the day , but i love sunshine.
i love cars.
my grandchildren range in age from 30 to 7.
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Pretty good, thanks for asking. I'm a kindergarten teacher, and I'm really enjoying the break. What do you do for work?
I'm still in school, but I'm majoring in education. I hope to be a teacher one day too!
That's awesome! What grade do you want to teach?
I'm not sure yet. I'm really interested in teaching kindergarten, but I'm also considering teaching high school math or science.
That's great. I love kindergarten, but I'm not sure I'm smart enough to teach high school math or science!
I'm sure you're smart enough! You're a kindergarten teacher, which is a really hard job.
Thanks, I appreciate that! I'm just not sure I have the patience for teenagers.
I know what you mean. Teenagers can be tough. But I think you'd be a great high school teacher.
We'll see! I'm still a few years away from making that decision.
Me too. But I'm excited to start my journey to becoming a teacher.
You're going to do great things!
